## Solitaire Classic Free: Play the Timeless Card Game Online for Free

Are you looking for a fun way to relax and pass the time? Solitaire Classic Free is the perfect solution for you. Available online for free, this timeless card game is a classic that never goes out of style.

### The Rules of Solitaire Classic Free

Solitaire Classic Free is a single player card game played with a standard deck of 52 cards. The object of the game is to move all the cards onto the foundation piles in ascending order from Ace to King.

The game is played with seven piles of cards on the tableau, and the top card of each pile is turned face up. The remaining cards are placed in the stock pile.

To move the cards, you can either transfer cards from one tableau pile to another, or you can move cards from the tableau piles to the foundation piles. You can only move cards onto the foundation piles if they are in the correct sequence and suit.

### Features of Solitaire Classic Free

Solitaire Classic Free is easy to play and perfect for beginners. The game is available online for free, so you can play it anytime, anywhere. The game's simple and intuitive interface allows you to quickly and easily make moves and progress through the game.

The game also includes helpful features such as undo, which allows you to undo a move if you make a mistake, and hints, which suggest possible moves to help you progress through the game.
